# opnsense_nginx_settings (Data Source)

Read OPNsense Nginx plugin general settings.

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ban_ttl` (Number) Ban duration in seconds before a blocked client is released.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Nginx plugin service is enabled.
